name: Alligator Express
description:
Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Prevent Alligator Attack - Flick mouse in the opposite direction

How To Play:

  • You are a train operator on Alligator Express. Walk over to passengers and ask them for their ticket.
  • Take care of your flying pet alligator, feed him free riders to keep him full.
  • To prevent your pet from attacking passengers quickly flick the mouse in the opposite direction of the attack. 

Developed in 48h for the GameDevTecnico Christmas Jam.

In this jam each team of two was tasked with satisfying game wishes from 2 other members. Our team's wishes were:

  • "This year I really want a train to play with. Thanks. P.S: I also love cheesecake"
  • "I have always wanted a cute pet alligator that can fly"

Using this prompts we came up with an idea for a game involving a train security guard checking tickets, while walking his flying pet alligator. The alligator would constantly try to eat passengers, it was up to the player to only let him eat non-paying costumers.
